strings: <voice_0x01001635><se_low><center>Whaaaaaaargh!
<voice_0x01001636><se_low><center>The power!

<voice_0x01001637><se_low><center>At last my soul has the almighty
<center>flesh and blood it deserves!

<voice_0x01001638><se_low><center>The time has come...
<center>Now for the rite of union that will
<center>bring the two worlds together as one!

<voice_0x01001639><se_low><center>Come, my slaves!
<center>Devour this vulgar world!

<voice_0x0100163A><center>Rhapthorne has opened the door between the
<center>World of Light and the World of Darkness.
<center>I was able to come through.
<voice_0x0100163B><center>But in my wake come dark hordes innumerable!

<voice_0x0100163C><center>Unchecked, his evil minions will exterminate
<center>every living being in this world!

<voice_0x0100163D><center>Rhapthorne has already assumed his full
<center>physical form. Matters have gone beyond
<center>sealing him away now.

<voice_0x0100163E><center>Our only recourse is to defeat him in battle,
<center><hero>.

<voice_0x0100163F><center>It is the only way to save our world
<center>now that he has become so powerful.

<voice_0x01001640><center>But the chances of defeating him are slim...
<center>You are our only hope.

<voice_0x01001641><center>You, <hero>, have the blood
<center>of a chosen one in your veins...
<center>Within you, <hero>,
<center>there shines a glimmer of light.

<voice_0x01001642><center>But in his current state, Rhapthorne
<center>is protected by a mighty shield.

<voice_0x01001643><center>We must first break it down,
<center>for it renders him impervious to harm.
<voice_0x01001644><center>Hold out your hand, <hero>.
<voice_0x01001645><center>That is the echo flute.

<voice_0x01001646><center>We will not be able to penetrate
<center>Rhapthorne's shield alone.
<center>We will need help.

<voice_0x01001647><center>The help of the seven sages...
<center>The brave souls who sealed
<center>Rhapthorne away long ago.

<voice_0x01001648><center>I can feel them. Their will is strong.
<center>They have returned to help us to defeat
<center>the Lord of Darkness once and for all.

<voice_0x01001649><center>They have taken the form of seven
<center>magical orbs, each containing
<center>the power of one sage.

<voice_0x0100164A><center>Use the flute. It will aid you in finding them.
<center>They are scattered around the world,
<center>but you must bring them together.

<voice_0x0100164B><center>If you are near an orb when you play the flute,
<center>it will answer you with an echo.

<voice_0x0100164C><center>Just as there were seven sages,
<center>now there are seven orbs.

<voice_0x0100164D><center>You must gather all seven
<center>before returning to me here.

<voice_0x0100164E><center>I too have something I must find.
<center>So I must go, but I will return.

<voice_0x0100164F><center>There is little time, <hero>.
<center>We must hurry!
